00069 void InitializeTestLevel(void)
00070 {       
00071         int hudLoop;
00072 
00073         // Reset the object list
00074         resetObjectList();
00075 
00076         // Set the HUDlist to 0
00077         for (hudLoop = 0; hudLoop < 20; hudLoop++)
00078                 HUDList.HudItem[hudLoop] = 0;
00079 
00080         // Create the HAMs
00081         Hammy = CreateSprite("Hammy", "TextureFiles/Ham.png", 150.0f, 140.0f, 20, 1, 1);
00082         Hammy2 = CreateSprite("Hammy2", "TextureFiles/Ham.png", 150.0f, 140.0f, 22, 1, 1);
00083 
00084         // Collision for the first HAM
00085         Hammy->SensorType   = RectangleCollider;
00086         Hammy->Position.x   = 400.0f;
00087         Hammy->SpriteType   = FoodType;
00088         Hammy->CollideDebug = 1;
00089         Hammy->CollideOffset.x =  200.0f;
00090         Hammy->CollideOffset.y =  0.0f;
00091 
00092         // Collision for the second HAM
00093         Hammy2->SensorType = RectangleCollider;
00094         Hammy2->Position.y = -100.0f;
00095         Hammy2->Position.x = -500.0f;
00096         Hammy2->SpriteType = FoodType;
00097 
00098         // Creating the HUD items
00099         HUD1 = CreateSprite("HUD1", "TextureFiles/GinkoHUD.png", 320.0f, 137.0f, 200, 1, 1);
00100         HUD1->CanCollide = 0;
00101         HUD1->SpriteType = HudType;
00102 
00103         HUD2 = CreateSprite("HUD2", "TextureFiles/HollyHUD.png", 320.0f, 137.0f, 200, 1, 1);
00104         HUD2->CanCollide = 0;
00105         HUD2->SpriteType = HudType;
00106         
00107         HUD3 = CreateSprite("HUD3", "TextureFiles/MaypleHUD.png", 320.0f, 137.0f, 200, 1, 1);
00108         HUD3->CanCollide = 0;
00109         HUD3->SpriteType = HudType;
00110 
00111         HUD4 = CreateSprite("HUD4", "TextureFiles/KayaHUD.png", 320.0f, 137.0f, 200, 1, 1);
00112         HUD4->CanCollide = 0;
00113         HUD4->SpriteType = HudType;
00114 
00115         HUD1item = CreateSprite("HUDitem", "TextureFiles/HealthPotionHUD.png", 44.0f, 44.0f, 200, 1, 1);
00116         HUD1item->CanCollide = 0;
00117         HUD1item->SpriteType = HudType;
00118         HUD1item->ItemType = 0;
00119 
00120         HUD2item = CreateSprite("HUDitem", "TextureFiles/HealthPotionHUD.png", 44.0f, 44.0f, 200, 1, 1);
00121         HUD2item->CanCollide = 0;
00122         HUD2item->SpriteType = HudType;
00123         HUD2item->ItemType = 0;
00124 
00125         HUD3item = CreateSprite("HUDitem", "TextureFiles/HealthPotionHUD.png", 44.0f, 44.0f, 200, 1, 1);
00126         HUD3item->CanCollide = 0;
00127         HUD3item->SpriteType = HudType;
00128         HUD3item->ItemType = 0;
00129 
00130         HUD4item = CreateSprite("HUDitem", "TextureFiles/HealthPotionHUD.png", 44.0f, 44.0f, 200, 1, 1);
00131         HUD4item->CanCollide = 0;
00132         HUD4item->SpriteType = HudType;
00133         HUD4item->ItemType = 0;
00134 
00135         // Add HUD items to the list
00136         HUDList.HudItem[0] = HUD1;
00137         HUDList.HudItem[2] = HUD2;
00138         HUDList.HudItem[4] = HUD3;
00139         HUDList.HudItem[6] = HUD4;
00140         HUDList.HudItem[1] = HUD1item;
00141         HUDList.HudItem[3] = HUD2item;
00142         HUDList.HudItem[5] = HUD3item;
00143         HUDList.HudItem[7] = HUD4item;
00144 
00145         // Create the background
00146         Background = CreateSprite("Background", "TextureFiles/LevelGrassground.png", 3840.0f, 720.0f, 0, 1, 1);
00147         Background->CanCollide = 0;
00148 
00149         // Secret invisible collider GO!
00150         ColliderInvisible = CreateSprite("ColliderInvisible", "TextureFiles/LevelGrassground.png", 300.0f, 80.0f, 0, 1, 1);
00151         ColliderInvisible->SpriteType = PlatformType;
00152         ColliderInvisible->Visible = FALSE;
00153         ColliderInvisible->CollideDebug = TRUE;
00154         ColliderInvisible->Position.x = -1020.0f;
00155         ColliderInvisible->Position.y = -40.0f;
00156 
00157         // Creates the player
00158         if(NULL != malloc(sizeof(Player)))
00159                 InitializePlayer(&CurrentPlayer);
00160 
00161         // Creates the enemy
00162         if(NULL != malloc(sizeof(Enemy)))
00163                 InitializeEnemy(&CurrentEnemy);
00164         CurrentEnemy.EnemySprite->CollideDebug = TRUE;
00165         CurrentEnemy.EnemySprite->CollideSize.x = CurrentEnemy.EnemySprite->Width  / 1.1;
00166         CurrentEnemy.EnemySprite->CollideSize.y = CurrentEnemy.EnemySprite->Height / 1.1;
00167 
00168 
00169         // Adds the player and enemy to the collilde list
00170         AddCollidable(CurrentEnemy.EnemySprite);
00171         AddCollidable(CurrentPlayer.PlayerSprite);
00172 
00173         // Show debug box
00174         CurrentPlayer.PlayerSprite->CollideDebug = TRUE;
00175 
00176         // Reset camera to (0,0)
00177         ResetCamera();
00178 }
00179 
00180 /*************************************************************************/
00185 /*************************************************************************/
00186 void UpdateTestLevel(void)
00187 {
00188         // Run the enemy logic and update the enemy
00189         EnemyLogic(&CurrentEnemy, &CurrentPlayer);
00190         UpdateEnemy(&CurrentEnemy);
00191 
00192         // Handle test level events
00193         EventTestLevel();
00194 
00195         // Update the player's position
00196         UpdatePlayerPosition(&CurrentPlayer);
00197 
00198         // Go back to main menu with ESC
00199         if(AEInputCheckTriggered(VK_ESCAPE))
00200         {
00201                 SetNextState(GS_MainMenu);
00202         }
00203 }

00210 /*************************************************************************/
00211 void DrawTestLevel(void)
00212 {
00213         // Draws the objects in the object list
00214         drawObjectList();
00215 
00216         //Camera follows player
00217         SetCamera(&CurrentPlayer.Position, 350, &HUDList);
00218 }

00242 /*************************************************************************/
00247 /*************************************************************************/
00248 void EventTestLevel(void)
00249 {
00250         // Detect and handle collisions
00251         DetectCollision();
00252 
00253         // Handle any input for the player
00254         InputPlayer(&CurrentPlayer);
00255 
00256         // Handle item switching for the HUD
00257         if(AEInputCheckTriggered('Q'))
00258         {
00259                 if (HUD1item->ItemType == 0)
00260                 {
00261                         HUD1item->SpriteTexture = AEGfxTextureLoad("TextureFiles/ThrowableHUD.png");
00262                         HUD1item->ItemType = 1;
00263                 }
00264                 else
00265                 {
00266                         HUD1item->SpriteTexture = AEGfxTextureLoad("TextureFiles/HealthPotionHUD.png");
00267                         HUD1item->ItemType = 0;
00268                 }
00269         }
00270 }
